page.title: 03ATTITUDES KIRKBY MALZEARD
page.content: This area has no feudal tradition with a 'big house'supporting estate workers Instead there are many successful and enterprising self-employed people. Others who work outside the area live here because they prefer the mixed community, and find their recreation in local activities. Much practical kindness is shown in care of those in need of help of many sorts and there is great generosity in answer to calls for funds for local, national and international charities. There is interest in keeping local footpaths, and some concern about the quality of drinking water may soon be allayed when our new supply is connected. There is worry about possible closure of churches, schools, shops and bus routes.
